Subject: Shattered Silence
Message-ID: <9injkr+jcn8@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 831
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Legendarynemasis@...

Off the coast of what possibly is washington or oregon by the 
Chivtrons base five seperate suits rise from the ocean depths. Each 
one carrying a member of the all too quiet Vile Force. Each member 
quickly presses a green button on the suit making it transform into 
an orb like object that flys off into the sea. The leader then steps 
forward onto the sand and scans the area, large amounts of firepower 
were apparently being exchanged nearby. He then spins on one heel and 
turns to face Methos, Gemini 1, and Gemini 2.

Vile: "It is time to test out the funnels. Remember, we each have 
only nine of these and each only has two uses. So make them count. It 
is about time that we help someone here to gain allys."

The three X-Predacons nod before all four bots hover into the air and 
speed off towards the Chivtrons base.
